issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

Expecting `android:screenOrientation="unspecified"` or `"fullSensor"` for this activity so the user can use the application in any orientation and provide a great experience on Chrome OS devices
Expecting `android:screenOrientation="unspecified"` or `"fullSensor"` for this activity so the user can use the application in any orientation and provide a great experience on Chrome OS devices
Should not restrict activity to fixed orientation. This may not be suitable for different form factors, causing the app to be letterboxed.
It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
This folder configuration (`v24`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 29. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 29. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `DatabaseService` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
This field leaks a context object
The application adaptive icon is missing a monochrome tag
The application adaptive roundIcon is missing a monochrome tag
This text field does not specify an `inputType`
Missing `autofillHints` attribute
